questions.question: So I thought I'd just go up and ask them, you know, how do I get to the beach?
Well, yeah, but at the same time, maybe, I mean, often people will say, what's your vision for the future?
How can we make a hope of having a semi-confident predictions about the complex system?
How does the basic scientific facts of our reality map to what we should do as a human civilization?
What do you think about robots and AI as part of the expanding out into the universe?
But in general, what do you think is the role of love in the human condition?
